title: Keep Your Vision In Front of You
itunes:title: Keep Your Vision In Front of You
description:
Many people lose their passion in life because there is nothing to remind them of their dreams, hopes and prayers. If you’ll have a big vision, God will not only do what you’re dreaming about, He will do more than you can ask or think.-Visit https://joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? https://instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
